what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Klippel-Trenaunay Syndrome (KTS) ?,The NINDS supports research on congenital disorders such as KTS with the goal of finding new means to treat and prevent them.,NINDS,Klippel-Trenaunay Syndrome (KTS)
